original: @28a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @28a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: s'i ta t'a ra s'a dha nam /
analyzed: s'i ta t'a ra s'a dha nam /
translated: Sitatārāsādhana

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: sgrol ma dkar mo'i sgrub pa'i thabs /
analyzed: sgrol ma dkar mo'i sgrub pa'i thabs /
translated: The Sādhana of Sitātapatrā

original: 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽ched du zla ba drug gi bar //
analyzed: 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo // ched du zla ba drug gi bar //
translated: Homage to Noble Tārā.🔽For the sake of

original: sgrol ma'i 'khor lo sgom pa pos //
analyzed: sgrol ma'i 'khor lo sgom pa pos //
translated: meditating on Tārā’s wheel for six months,

original: dngos grub thams cad 'thob 'gyur zhing //
analyzed: dngos grub thams cad 'thob 'gyur zhing //
translated: one will attain all powers

original: 'chi ba'i skyon gyis ma gos @28b pa'i ;
analyzed: 'chi ba'i skyon gyis ma gos @28b pa'i ;
translated: and not be tainted by the faults of death.

original: / ngag gi dbang phyug gnang byas la //
analyzed: / ngag gi dbang phyug gnang byas la //
translated: Having received permission from the lord of speech,

original: 'chi bdag slu ba bsdus pa las //
analyzed: 'chi bdag slu ba bsdus pa las //
translated: I will extract from the Delusion of Death

original: phyung nas sgrol ma dkar mo ni //
analyzed: phyung nas sgrol ma dkar mo ni //
translated: the white Tārā

original: bsgoms nas 'jigs pa nyams byed ma //
analyzed: bsgoms nas 'jigs pa nyams byed ma //
translated: and meditate on her, the one who destroys fear.

original: bzhi pa'i sde tshan dang po aa //
analyzed: bzhi pa'i sde tshan dang po aa //
translated: The first of the fourth set is aṃ,

original: bcas las nam mkha' 'od zer spros //
analyzed: bcas las nam mkha' 'od zer spros //
translated: from which space radiates light rays.

original: pad dkar zla ba'i gdan bltas la //
analyzed: pad dkar zla ba'i gdan bltas la //
translated: Looking at the seat of a white lotus and moon,

original: gsum la skyabs 'gro yang brjod bya //
analyzed: gsum la skyabs 'gro yang brjod bya //
translated: one should also go for refuge to the three.

original: rang bzhin sgro btags gzhom ched du //
analyzed: rang bzhin sgro btags gzhom ched du //
translated: For the sake of destroying the superimposition of intrinsic nature,

original: skad cig stong pa nyid du blta //
analyzed: skad cig stong pa nyid du blta //
translated: one should see it as emptiness in an instant.

original: de nas sngon gyi smon lam dbang //
analyzed: de nas sngon gyi smon lam dbang //
translated: Then, through the power of previous aspirations,

original: byang chub sems kyi yi ge bsgom //
analyzed: byang chub sems kyi yi ge bsgom //
translated: one should meditate on the syllable of bodhicitta.

original: padma dkar po'i dbus gnas pa'i //
analyzed: padma dkar po'i dbus gnas pa'i //
translated: In the center of a white lotus,

original: zla ba'i gzugs kyi steng du ni //
analyzed: zla ba'i gzugs kyi steng du ni //
translated: upon a moon-disc form,

original: rdo rje skyil mo krung bcas pa //
analyzed: rdo rje skyil mo krung bcas pa //
translated: seated in the vajra posture,

original: mchog sbyin pa dang autpa la 'dzin //
analyzed: mchog sbyin pa dang autpa la 'dzin //
translated: bestowing boons, holding an utpala,

original: ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od rnam can //
analyzed: ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od rnam can //
translated: possessing the radiance of an autumn moon,

original: zla ba'i rgyab la mnyam brten pa'i //
analyzed: zla ba'i rgyab la mnyam brten pa'i //
translated: evenly supported by the moon behind,

original: rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs //
analyzed: rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs //
translated: with all ornaments fully complete,

original: bcu drug lo lon lus can ma //
analyzed: bcu drug lo lon lus can ma //
translated: a sixteen-year-old maiden,

original: sangs rgyas kun dang de sras kyi //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun dang de sras kyi //
translated: the mother of all the Buddhas and their sons,

original: yum ni 'dod pa'i gzugs 'dzin ma //
analyzed: yum ni 'dod pa'i gzugs 'dzin ma //
translated: taking on a desirable form,

original: sgrol ma de yi snying gar bsgom //
analyzed: sgrol ma de yi snying gar bsgom //
translated: meditate on Tara in his heart.

original: 'khor lo 'od zer dkar po can //🔽re'u mig brgyad la yi ge brgyad //
analyzed: 'khor lo 'od zer dkar po can // re'u mig brgyad la yi ge brgyad //
translated: The wheel has white light rays,🔽with the eight syllables surrounding

original: yongs su bskor bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: yongs su bskor bar bya ba'o //
translated: the eight segments.

original: aom h'a gsal byed dbus gnas pa'i //
analyzed: aom h'a gsal byed dbus gnas pa'i //
translated: In the center of the clear syllable A

original: bsgrub bya'i ming ni lte bar bya //
analyzed: bsgrub bya'i ming ni lte bar bya //
translated: is the name of the one to be accomplished.

original: zla drug rtse gcig pa'i yid kyis //
analyzed: zla drug rtse gcig pa'i yid kyis //
translated: For six months, with a one-pointed mind,

original: nges par brtan po dag tu bya //
analyzed: nges par brtan po dag tu bya //
translated: make it stable and firm.🔽With an undistracted mind,

original: yi ge bcu pa'i sngags 'di ni //🔽mi skyo yid kyis bzlas bya ste //
analyzed: yi ge bcu pa'i sngags 'di ni //🔽mi skyo yid kyis bzlas bya ste //
translated: recite this ten-syllable mantra:🔽Om tare tuttare ture svaha.

original: aom gyi yi ge dang por sbyin //🔽phyis ni t'a re rab tu sbyar //
analyzed: aom gyi yi ge dang por sbyin // phyis ni t'a re rab tu sbyar //
translated: The syllable Oṃ is placed at the beginning.🔽Then Tārā is added.

original: tutt'a re la tu re phyis //
analyzed: tutt'a re la tu re phyis //
translated: After Tuttāre, Ture is added.

original: sv'a h'a mtha' ru las kun byed //
analyzed: sv'a h'a mtha' ru las kun byed //
translated: Svaha at the end accomplishes all activities.🔽Brahmā, Indra, Viṣṇu, Candra, Sūrya,

original: tshangs dbang khyab 'jug zla nyi dang // drag po phyogs skyong 'dod lhas kyang //
analyzed: tshangs dbang khyab 'jug zla nyi dang // drag po phyogs skyong 'dod lhas kyang //
translated: Rudra, the guardians of the directions, and the desire gods

original: ba spu'i rtse mo 'ang gcod mi nus //
analyzed: ba spu'i rtse mo 'ang gcod mi nus //
translated: cannot even cut a hair tip of her.

original: 'chi bdag las rgyal sgrol ma bzhin //
analyzed: 'chi bdag las rgyal sgrol ma bzhin //
translated: She is victorious over the Lord of Death, like Tārā.

original: skra dkar gnyer ma skal ngan nad //
analyzed: skra dkar gnyer ma skal ngan nad //
translated: Wrinkles, bad luck, illness,

original: dbul ba la sogs mdor bsdus na //
analyzed: dbul ba la sogs mdor bsdus na //
translated: poverty, and so forth are all destroyed.🔽She conquers the eight great fears such as lions,

original: seng sogs 'jigs pa che brgyad dang // sdug bsngal rab tu 'joms byed pa //
analyzed: seng sogs 'jigs pa che brgyad dang // sdug bsngal rab tu 'joms byed pa //
translated: and all suffering.

original: bskul ba med par gus btud par //
analyzed: bskul ba med par gus btud par //
translated: Without being urged, she respectfully bows

original: khang bzangs rin chen segs  kyang 'du //
analyzed: khang bzangs rin chen segs  kyang 'du //
translated: to the jeweled palace and so forth.🔽The sword, eye medicine, foot ointment,

original: ral gri dang ni mig sman dang// rkang pa bum pa bzang sogs 'grub //
analyzed: ral gri dang ni mig sman dang// rkang pa bum pa bzang sogs 'grub //
translated: and the excellent vase and so forth are accomplished.🔽One becomes a poet, a master of prosody,

original: tshigs bcad mkhan dang snyan ngag dang // blo rno shes rab dri med 'gyur //
analyzed: tshigs bcad mkhan dang snyan ngag dang // blo rno shes rab dri med 'gyur //
translated: and has sharp intelligence and stainless wisdom.

original: gzhan yang ci 'dod dngos grub ni //
analyzed: gzhan yang ci 'dod dngos grub ni //
translated: Moreover, whatever siddhis one desires

original: 'khor lo de las 'byung bar 'gyur //
analyzed: 'khor lo de las 'byung bar 'gyur //
translated: will arise from that wheel.
